name: BLOOD TALES
description:
Travel through the body by gathering hormones to differentiate your form!

Made in 20 hours for GameLab 2016, a game jam run in a Stem Cell Research Facility.

ARTWORK BY: Susannah McLaren

RESEARCH BY: Ibtehal Omar

DESIGN BY: Dr Andrea Dimitracopoulos

PROGRAMMING BY: Alex Johansson

AUDIO BY: Sebastian Peters
